description: The 28-year-old looked a little too worse for wear to conceal her choice to go completely underwear-free, suffering a triple overexposure in the street outside as she left Steam & Rye on Thursday night.
title: Pascal Craymer suffers a shocking triple wardrobe fail at Kelly Brook's bar
title_page: Pascal Craymer suffers a shocking triple wardrobe fail at Kelly Brook's bar | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's not known for modesty, but Pascal Craymer was asking for trouble in a super-plunging double thigh split dress on Thursday night.
Hit by a strong wind on the way out of Kelly Brook's London Steam And Rye bar party, the former TOWIE star was caught letting it all hang out of the daring silk dress.
The 28-year-old looked a little too worse for wear to conceal her choice to go completely underwear-free, suffering a triple overexposure in the street outside.
Scroll down for video
Overexposure: Pascal Craymer suffered a triple wardrobe malfunction on Thursday night as she left London's Steam And Rye bar party in a daring dress
Cheeky Pascal didn't seem to mind through, disregarding the wardrobe malfunction, she smiled boldly and posed with little effort to conceal her modesty.
It was a hard dress to negotiate after all. With a slinky panel in the front and a neckline that dipped right to her waistband, Pascal had not made life easy for herself, especially going commando.
Of course, she'd made a dignified entrance to the event, having the best intentions for a glamorous appearance alongside pals including Jess Impiazzi and Jess Hayes.
Cheeky: The former TOWIE star proved that she had gone commando when she left her dress and ran into the wind
Ooops! The reality TV face showed off way too much as she went completely underwear free in a hard-to-negotiate dress
Shocker: It was a shocking misjudgment on the glamour front
It had been a meeting of reality minds at the second anniversary of Kelly Brook's bar, with The Ex On The Beach star and Love Island winner battling to ensure all eyes were on them.
Impizzazi looked super sexy in a bustier-style top, while the Hayes went equally raunchy in a flesh-flashing mesh number.
The former, who found fame starring in the second season of the MTV dating show, showed off her incredibly trim figure in the saucy ensemble.
Her skin-tight top clung to her taut abs before boosting her extremely ample assets to perfection - permitting a generous glimpse at her cleavage.
Hard to negotiate: The dress was difficult enough to manage, even with some underwear
Glamour girl: She flicked about her hair extensions to leave her neckline bare
Poser: She had the best of intentions when she arrived, proud to pose in the street
Easy does it: Even as she cut angles for the cameras, she was close to popping out of the dress
Yikes: Pascal was smiling despite the unfortunate wardrobe incident in front of the lens
Paring down the look, the stunning reality starlet, who counts Simon Webb and Rogan O'Connor as exes, added thoroughly ripped jeans to the ensemble while boosting her height with pointed heels.
She pulled her hair into an elaborate Nineties style look with a half-high ponytail pulling the curled tresses off her face while the rest tumbled over her shoulders.
Jess Hayes, the winner of last year's revival of Love Island, wore a risque leotard with a mesh insert at the front, which exhibited the fact that she opted to forego a bra for the evening.
To enhance the sexy nature of the look, she tucked the leotard into a sexy leather pencil skirt which matched her leather clutch bag - emblazoned with white writing reading 'Yeah'.
Busty ladies: Jess Impiazzi (left) and her pal Jess Hayes (right) were battling to ensure all eyes were on them as they arrived for the same event that night
Stunner: Jess, who found fame starring in the second season of the MTV dating show, showed off her incredibly trim figure in the saucy ensemble
Braless: Jess, the winner of last year's revival of Love Island, wore a risque leotard with a mesh insert at the front, which exhibited the fact that she opted to forego a bra for the evening
Her trademark bright red locks were worn in lustrous bouncy curls, while she coordinated her vampish lipstick to her crimson locks.
Another Ex On The Beach star attended the event, as Anita Kaushik, who formerly dated Geordie Shore star Gaz Beadle, turned out in a highly-sophisticated white, two-piece.
Kelly Brook who co-owns the London venue, looked incredible in a black semi-sheer lace dress which had a skater skirt style.
She teamed the number with a pair of black tights and wore a pair of high heeled court shoes, in order to give herself some extra inches in the height department.
Model good looks: Another Ex On The Beach star attended the event, as Anita Kaushik, who formerly dated Geordie Shore star Gaz Beadle, turned out in a highly-sophisticated white, two-piece
Co-stars: Jess and Anita starred together in Ex On The Beach together
Let the good times roll: Kelly Brook looked like she was ready to seriously let her hair down when she arrived at the second birthday party of Steam And Rye bar on Thursday night
Letting her hair down: The 36-year-old, who co-owns the London venue, looked incredible in a black semi-sheer lace dress which had a skater skirt style at the circus-themed bash
With her brunette locks worn in curls which cascaded down past her shoulders, the stunner, who is dating her kick-boxing instructor, Jeremy Parisi, wore blinging diamond earrings.
Enjoying the circus themed bash, Kelly posed with a man dressed as a ringleader as she had fun on the night.
Three days before, Kelly marked the exact birth date of the bar when she tweeted: 'Happy 2nd Birthday @steamandrye.'
Busty: Jess put on an extremely display in her bustier which she tucked into ripped jeans
She also wrote on Instagram: '2 years ago we had a Dream this week we celebrate that Dream becoming a Reality @steamandrye Happy 2nd Birthday Steam and Rye #OffTheRails.'
Acting as the perfect promo for the venue, she also posted a picture of one amazing cocktail she was enjoying on the night.
Served in a camera lens, she captioned the black and white image with the words: 'Love this!!! #Nofilter Cocktail served in the Lens Cap With a Polaroid Taken at Your Table :))).'
New look: Little Mix star Jade Thirlwall showed off her edgy streaked hair (right) as she posed with a pal
